content: Some resources in the uscore-data-sets (https://github.com/inferno-community/uscore-data-sets) contain invalid display values in the us-core-ethnicity extension. See issue on the Synthea project: https://github.com/synthetichealth/synthea/pull/784

Thanks! FYI @Michael O'Keefe (we happen to be updating our data sets right now). I'm surprised this issue wasn't picked up by validation. Ah, it is for display values, I'm not sure if those are checked.
